author: Verge Staff
title: The Verge’s best and worst coronavirus masks
description: Verge staff discuss the face coverings we’re using during the coronavirus pandemic, including scarves and hand-sewn masks, following recommendations from the CDC and WHO.
content:
The scarf was a disaster
Photo by Loren Grush / The Verge
Last week, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention urged Americans to cover their faces in public, even if its with something as simple as a bandanna. Wearing a mask probably wont stop you … [+11177 chars]
